item.title: MSI G2412F Monitor Gaming 23 8" FHD - Pannello Rapid IPS 1920 x 1080 180 Hz / 1 ms GtG Gamma di colori 107% sRGB Adaptive Sync - DP 1.2a HDMI 2.0b CEC
